publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3328 Ms Margaret Curran: Civil Aviation Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the provisions in the Civil Aviation Bill, so far as they confer functions on the Scottish Ministers, should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-3328 Ms Margaret Curran: Civil Aviation Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament agrees that the provisions in the Civil Aviation Bill, so far as they confer functions on the Scottish Ministers, should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: George Lyon
